mapper.select: select count(c.course_id) from course c, user u, student_course sc where c.course_id = sc.course_id and sc.student_id = #{studentId} and u.user_id = c.teacher_id and (c.course_name like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%') or u.username like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%'))

select count(c.course_id) from course c, user u where c.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and u.user_id = c.teacher_id and (c.course_name like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%') or u.username like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT into course(course_name, course_description, teacher_id, semester, academic_year) value (#{courseName}, #{courseDescription}, #{teacherId}, #{semester}, #{academicYear})
